profileText: A Delegate from Delaware; born in Kent County, Del., birth date unknown; studied law; was admitted to the bar of New Castle County, 1784, and commenced practice in Dover, Del.; Member of the Continental Congress, 1787-1788; resumed the practice of his profession in Dover, Del., where he died about November 1, 1791.

researchRecord.name: In the alphabetical collection of Simon Gratz, 1677-1910, 100 linear feet.
